矛斑蝗鶯.definition: (bird species of China) lanceolated warbler (Locustella lanceolata)

矛盾.definition: contradiction; CL:個|个[ge4]; conflicting views; contradictory

矛紋草鶥.definition: (bird species of China) Chinese babax (Pterorhinus lanceolatus)

矛頭.definition: spearhead; barb; an attack or criticism

矛頭指向.definition: to target sb or sth (for attack, criticism etc)
